  • Method Details

    • checkAction

      boolean checkAction​(MarketMarble marble, PlayerDashboard player, Storage tempStorage, java.util.ArrayList<CounterTop> tempArrayDeposit)

    • useAction

      boolean useAction​(MarketMarble marble, PlayerDashboard player, GameManager gameManager)
      Parameters:
      marble - the marble involved in the action
      player - the player performing the action
      Returns:
      true if ended correctly

    • checkStore

      public boolean checkStore​(Storage tempStorage, java.util.ArrayList<CounterTop> tempArrayDeposit, Resource res, int row)
      Check if the action is legal, without updating the real user storage
      Parameters:
      tempStorage - the storage copy updated during checks on different marbles, to perform controls without updating the real storage
      tempArrayDeposit - the deposit array copy updated during checks on different marbles, to perform controls without updating the real deposits
      res - the resource the user wants to store
      row - the number of the storage row in which the resource should be added 1-3: first row, second row, third row 4: special deposit (leader card ability)
      Returns:
      true if the action is legal false if the action is illegal

    • storeResource

      public boolean storeResource​(PlayerDashboard player, Resource resource, int storageRow) throws CounterTopOverloadException
      Parameters:
      player - the player storing the resource
      resource - the resource to store
      storageRow - the number of the storage row in which the resource should be added 1-3: first row, second row, third row 4: special deposit (leader card ability)
      Returns:
      true if ended correctly
      Throws:
      CounterTopOverloadException

    • cannotCreateNewRow

      public boolean cannotCreateNewRow​(Resource res, Storage tempStorage)
      Check if the user already has a non-empty counterTop for this resource type
      Parameters:
      res - the resource type
      tempStorage - the storage of the player
      Returns:
      true if there is NOT another counterTop of the same type
